notes.title: Upload Tracking System
notes.description: Complete file upload tracking with history, statistics, and management. Track POIs, relationships, and wisdom extracted from each upload. View detailed extraction results including destinations, activities, and themes.

notes.title: Upload History Page
notes.description: New admin page showing all file uploads with extraction statistics. Filter by status (completed, failed), expand for details, download original files (if kept), and delete uploads.

notes.title: Keep/Delete File Option
notes.description: Users can now choose to keep original files after extraction or delete them automatically. Toggle added to upload form with visual indicator. Files are stored in Supabase Storage when kept.

notes.title: Manual File Deletion
notes.description: Delete button added to each upload record. Soft delete preserves audit trail while removing file from storage. Extracted knowledge remains in Neo4j database.

notes.title: Upload API Enhanced
notes.description: Upload API now tracks all uploads in database, records extraction statistics, stores files optionally, and logs errors. Provides detailed feedback on extraction results.

notes.title: Admin Menu Updates
notes.description: Added 'Upload History' to admin dropdown menu and Captain's Knowledge Portal. Easy access to upload management from anywhere in the system.

notes.title: Upload Tracking Table
notes.description: New upload_tracking table with comprehensive schema for tracking uploads, extraction results, file storage, and processing status. Includes RLS policies for privacy and access control.

notes.title: Fixed TypeScript Build Error
notes.description: Fixed type error in upload route where ExtractedKnowledge interface properties were incorrectly accessed. Now correctly extracts destinations, activities, and themes from POIs and relationships.

notes.title: Comprehensive Upload System Documentation
notes.description: Created detailed documentation including UPLOAD_TRACKING_COMPLETE.md, UPLOAD_TRACKING_ANSWERS.md, PAUL_UPLOAD_STATUS.md, and RUN_MIGRATION_INSTRUCTIONS.md. Includes usage guides, troubleshooting, and feature explanations.

notes.title: Supabase Storage Integration
notes.description: Integrated Supabase Storage for optional file retention. Created knowledge-uploads bucket with proper access policies. Supports file download and deletion.
